text: José Castillo Rondón (; March 19, 1981 – December 6, 2018) was a Venezuelan professional baseball infielder. He played for the Pittsburgh Pirates, San Francisco Giants, and Houston Astros of Major League Baseball (MLB) and the Chiba Lotte Marines and Yokohama BayStars of Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB). He was born in Las Mercedes, Guárico, Venezuela. Castillo and Luis Valbuena were killed in a car crash on December 6, 2018 in Yaracuy, Venezuela, aged 37. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Venezuelan baseball players Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players Category:San Francisco Giants players Category:Houston Astros players Category:Guárico
title: José Castillo (infielder)
